actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 162 (a) of the Internal Revenue Code to restrict the disallowance as commuting expense of deductions of certain automobile expenses.

summary.text: Provides that when the nature of business or employment necessitates several trips from home per day to a point of business or employment, only the first trip from home and the last trip back to home at night shall be nondeductible commuting expenses for purposes of eligibility for a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 162 (a) of the Internal Revenue Code to restrict the disallowance as commuting expense of deductions of certain automobile expenses.
